author: @nillionnetwork
text:
Introducing BPIs (Blind Provable Interfaces), the next evolution of APIs.

Users now control the flow of their data, and get paid for it.

From “apps take your data” → to data back under your control. https://t.co/Qe3cJAVEdL

author: @nillionnetwork
text:
Our first Korea Community Meetup was a huge success!

Over 300 people joined us in Seoul to talk privacy, tech, and the future we’re building.

Here’s a recap 👇 https://t.co/fZFZEohwvi
